Allegorithmic Substance Designer

Designer substance - a powerful program that is designed for creating, editing, and processing of large textures. The program allows you to mix and manipulate bitmaps, vector images and procedural elements. Textures created with Substance Designer are dynamic, ie they can be freely modified at any stage of creation. The user automatically receives the output different cards - diffuse, Norman, specular, etc.

Program developers have built into it a large number of templates and filters, which greatly simplify the work of the designer. Such filters are for example available "in Bitpam material", "Dynamic Shadow", "rust", etc. Package "Substance Designer" also includes the application "Substance Player" to view your custom textures, and included in the package of training textures.

Substance Designer supports importing textures from such programs as Photoshop, 3ds Max, Autodesk Maya, Unity 3.4 (and higher). The program allows for real-time to make changes and apply effects. In addition, Substance Designer supports vector image format and can work with layers.
